pr_title: Add list-match-pattern support to match statement

timeline.message: Recovery logic for list match pattern for map pattern.
Test cases for adding list match pattern support for match statement.

timeline.bodyText: Can we keep the original name?
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.bodyText: list match pattern can also be an empty list. So a while loop would be a better option?
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.bodyText: should we add => also here? What if the close bracket is missing?
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.message:
Make requested changes.
Undo rename MATCH_PATTERN_RHS to MATCH_PATTERN_OUTER_RHS. Change do while loop to while loop.
